problem_names:
lemma general_theorem: 
  fixes P f and l :: nat
  assumes "(\<forall>p. P p \<and> f p > l \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' < f p))"
  shows "(\<forall>p. P p \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l))"
translations:
lemma general_theorem: 
  fixes P f and l :: nat
  assumes "(\<forall>p. P p \<and> f p > l \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' < f p))"
  shows "(\<forall>p. P p \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>p.
       P p \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>p.
       P p \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)
have "\<forall>p. (n = f p) \<and> P p \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)" for n

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>p.
       n = f p \<and> P p \<longrightarrow>
       (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)
apply(rule Nat.nat_less_induct[where ?P = "%n. \<forall>p. (n = f p) \<and> P p \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)"])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n.
       \<forall>m<n.
          \<forall>p.
             m = f p \<and> P p \<longrightarrow>
             (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l) \<Longrightarrow>
       \<forall>p.
          n = f p \<and> P p \<longrightarrow>
          (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>p.
     ?n = f p \<and> P p \<longrightarrow>
     (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>p.
       P p \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>p.
     ?n = f p \<and> P p \<longrightarrow>
     (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>p.
     ?n = f p \<and> P p \<longrightarrow>
     (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>p.
       P p \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>p. P p \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>p'. P p' \<and> f p' \<le> l)

goal:
No subgoals!
